# SingleStoreProtocolException class

[`SingleStoreProtocolException`](./SingleStoreProtocolException.md) is thrown when there is an internal protocol error communicating with SingleStore Server.

```csharp
public sealed class SingleStoreProtocolException : InvalidOperationException
```
